mapper.sql: a.id_ AS id, a.name_ AS name, a.parent_id AS parentId, p.name_ AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS parentIds, a.type_ AS type, a.permission_ AS permission, a.sort_ AS sort, a.target_ AS target, a.url_ AS url, a.request_method AS requestMethod, a.status_ AS STATUS, a.icon_cls AS iconCls, a.show_type AS showType, a.description_ AS description, a.version_ AS version, a.is_leaf AS isLeaf, a.created_by AS createdBy, a.created_date AS createdDate, a.last_modified_by AS lastModifiedBy, a.last_modified_date AS lastModifiedDate
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_module_t a LEFT JOIN sys_module_t p on p.id_=a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_module_t rm on rm.module_id=a.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_role_t r on r.id_=rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_t ur on ur.role_id=r.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_user_t u ON u.id_=ur.user_id and u.id_ = #{user.id} WHERE a.status_ = #{user.FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.status_ = #{user.FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.status_ = #{user.FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort_
